statements: SELECT * FROM Evacuees;
SELECT evacuee_name, contact_number FROM Evacuees WHERE evacuation_status = TRUE;
SELECT evacuee_id, evacuee_name, current_location, destination_shelter FROM Evacuees WHERE evacuation_status = FALSE;
SELECT evacuee_name, current_location, destination_shelter FROM Evacuees WHERE evacuation_status = TRUE ORDER BY evacuee_name ASC;
SELECT evacuee_id, evacuee_name, contact_number FROM Evacuees WHERE current_location = 'City A' AND destination_shelter = 'Shelter X';
SELECT * FROM Evacuees WHERE evacuation_status = TRUE ORDER BY evacuee_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT evacuee_name, contact_number, current_location FROM Evacuees WHERE destination_shelter = 'Shelter A' ORDER BY evacuee_name
SELECT evacuee_id, evacuee_name, current_location, destination_shelter FROM Evacuees WHERE evacuation_status = FALSE AND current_location != destination_shelter
SELECT evacuee_id, evacuee_name, destination_shelter FROM Evacuees WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY evacuee_id ASC
SELECT evacuee_name, evacuation_status FROM Evacuees WHERE current_location IN ('City A', 'City B', 'City C')
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT evacuee_name, evacuation_location FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT evacuee_name, destination_shelter FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_date >= '2021-10-01' ORDER BY evacuation_date DESC;
SELECT evacuee_id, evacuee_name, evacuation_location, destination_shelter FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_location = 'Community Center' AND destination_shelter = 'School';
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE start_location = 'Airport' AND end_location = 'Shelter' ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time;
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT evacuee_name, evacuation_location, evacuation_date FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_location='City A';
SELECT evacuee_name, destination_shelter, evacuation_date FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_location='City B' ORDER BY evacuation_date DESC;
SELECT transport_id, vehicle_number, driver_name, start_location, end_location FROM transportation WHERE estimated_arrival_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT evacuee_name, evacuation_location, destination_shelter, evacuation_date FROM evacuees JOIN transportation ON evacuees.evacuation_location = transportation.start_location;
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT name, age FROM evacuees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE capacity >= 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT transport_id, vehicle_type, driver_name FROM transportation WHERE available_seats > 5 ORDER BY transport_id DESC;
SELECT name, contact_number, age FROM evacuees WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age;
SELECT name, age, contact_number FROM evacuees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT evacuee_id, name, age, contact_number FROM evacuees WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity, contact_person, contact_number FROM shelters WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE available_seats >= 10 AND departure_time > NOW() ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM evacuees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT evacuee_id, name, evacuation_point FROM evacuees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY shelter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE type = 'Bus';
SELECT movement_id, movement_time FROM movements WHERE movement_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY movement_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT name, age, evacuation_point FROM evacuees WHERE age > 30;
SELECT shelter_id, location, capacity FROM shelters ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT evacuee_id, name, contact_number, evacuation_point FROM evacuees WHERE evacuation_point = 'City Hall';

SELECT movements.movement_id, evacuees.name as evacuee_name, shelters.location as shelter_location, transportation.type as vehicle_type FROM movements JOIN evacuees ON movements.evacuee_id = evacuees.evacuee_id JOIN shelters ON movements.shelter_id = shelters.shelter_id JOIN transportation ON movements.vehicle_id = transportation.vehicle_id ORDER BY movements.movement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT name, current_location FROM evacuees ORDER BY current_location DESC;
SELECT evacuee_id, contact_number FROM evacuees WHERE destination_shelter = 'ABC Shelter';
SELECT * FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT tracking_id, timestamp, status FROM tracking_history WHERE status = 'On Hold' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM evacuees;
SELECT name, current_location FROM evacuees WHERE destination_shelter = 'Shelter A';
SELECT evacuee_id, name, contact_number FROM evacuees ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT shelter_id, name, location, capacity FROM shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT e.name AS evacuee_name, th.timestamp AS last_location_update FROM evacuees e JOIN tracking_history th ON e.evacuee_id = th.evacuee_id WHERE th.location LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY th.timestamp DESC;
